shortdesc.ph: Gets the user information by passing in the user ID.

section.p: After a remote user joins the channel, the SDK gets the UID and user account of the remote user, caches them in a mapping table object (`userInfo`), and triggers this callback on the local client.

After receiving the \ref agora::rtc::IRtcEngineEventHandler::onUserInfoUpdated "onUserInfoUpdated" callback, you can call this method to get the user account of the remote user from the `userInfo` object by passing in the user ID.

plentry.pd: Identifiers of a user. See class for details.
